EN.html: I'm creating an adaptive layout. I know flex and grid elements. I know the basics of working with forms
EN.css: I use the SASS/SCSS preprocessor and BEM methodology
EN.js: I work with asynchrony, I know about event Looper, objects, context and closure
EN.sass: I'm using SASS/SCSS preprocessor and BEM methodology
EN.gulp: I use GULP for minification, font manipulation, SCSS conversion and other automation
EN.vue: Understanding reactivity principles. Working with VueRouter
EN.node: I work with express and databases
EN.mysql: I know the basics of working with MySql
EN.mongo: I know the basics of MongoDB
EN.python: I know the syntax language and basics of OOP python
EN.django: Basic knowledge of the django framework
EN.console: Installing packages, reading errors and working with files via console
EN.figma: Designing layouts using the figma app
EN.language: I can make small talk. Understand the documentation
